fullplot: When her boyfriend is shot to death in a robbery, LA photographer Sopie Jacobs tries her hardest to put the event behind her. But as she struggles to get over the murder, Sophie's life begins to change, leaving her clueless as to what's coming. But worst of all, the line between reality and fantasy is beginning to shatter.
plot: Sophie Jacobs is going through the most difficult time of her life. Now, she just has to find out if it's real.
title: November
